name: Dream On, Dice Wizard
description:
Escape the dream-like nightmare... As the Dice Wizard, battle wacky foes inside your own dream, you muse try to wake up and escape this nightmare!  Can you defeat the Boogey Man?  Did the designers even made it possible to win? (lol)

(Please play the "Window Build" if possible, so the animation below work)

Design

Peerawich Sinamornwech 

Siwagon Seekhun
